synthesis_conditions.chemicals_used: pyridin-4-ylboronic acid (0.61 g, 5.0 mmol), 2,7-dibromo-9H-fluoren-9-one (0.68 g, 2.0 mmol), tetrakis­(triphenylphosphine)palladium (0) (0.13 g, 0.18 mmol), Na2CO3 (1 M, 6.0 mL) aqueous solution, 1,2-dimethoxyethane (10 mL), ethanol (EtOH, 4.5 mL)
FDP-O (1.13 g, 3.38 mmol), hydrazine monohydrate (1.0 mL, 19.6 mmol), ethanol (EtOH, 150 mL)
FDP-N-NH2 (0.10 g, 0.289 mmol), KOH (saturated solution in THF/EtOH 1:1), MgSO4, Celite
FDP-N2 (45 mg 0.13 mmol), H2ip (24 mg, 0.14 mmol), Zn­(NO3)2·6H2O (60 mg, 0.20 mmol), DMF (6 mL)
synthesis_conditions.drying_method: vacuum at room temperature for 2 days
